Package org.gsma.joyn.chat

This API exposes all functionality for single chat and group chat services.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
Chat Chat
ChatIntent Intent for chat conversation
ChatListener Chat event listener
ChatLog Content provider for chat history
ChatLog.GroupChat Group chat
ChatLog.Message Chat message from a single chat or group chat
ChatLog.Message.Direction Direction of the message
ChatLog.Message.Status Status of the message
ChatLog.Message.Status.Content Status of a content message
ChatLog.Message.Status.System Status of the system message
ChatLog.Message.Type Type of the message
ChatMessage Chat message
ChatService Chat service offers the main entry point to initiate chat 1-1 ang group conversations with contacts.
ChatServiceConfiguration Chat service configuration
GroupChat Group chat
GroupChat.Direction Direction of the group chat
GroupChat.Error Group chat error
GroupChat.State Group chat state
GroupChatIntent Intent for group chat conversation
GroupChatListener Group chat event listener
NewChatListener New chat invitation event listener
 

Package org.gsma.joyn.chat Description

This API exposes all functionality for single chat and group chat services.
